episodes.title: Scary-oke
episodes.plot: The Pines Family resolves to get back to normal by throwing a "Mystery Shack is Back" party ... but nothing is normal in Gravity Falls!

episodes.title: Into the Bunker
episodes.plot: When Dipper's secret journal pages lead him and the gang to the author's hidden bunker, they find themselves coming face to face with a mysterious figure from Gravity Falls' history.

episodes.title: The Golf War
episodes.plot: After being belittled by Pacifica too many times, Mabel challenges her to a miniature golf off, which gets out of control when some local residents offer their help.

episodes.title: Sock Opera
episodes.plot: Close to unlocking the author's laptop, Dipper is visited by the demon Bill, who wants to make a deal. Mabel puts on a puppet show to impress a boy.

episodes.title: Soos and the Real Girl
episodes.plot: Soos makes a promise to his grandma that he can find a girlfriend in one week, and buys a dating simulator game to help him learn how to talk to women.

episodes.title: Little Gift Shop of Horrors
episodes.plot: Stan tells a series of three spooky tales to an unlucky customer at the Mystery Shack after hours.

episodes.title: Society of the Blind Eye
episodes.plot: Dipper and the gang discover a secret society that has been erasing the memories of the citizens of Gravity Falls.

episodes.title: Blendin's Game
episodes.plot: Blendin returns to face off with Dipper and Mabel in a futuristic battle that could trap them forever in time jail.

episodes.title: The Love God
episodes.plot: After seeing Robbie's sadness over his and Wendy's breakup, Mabel steals a love potion from a Love God.

episodes.title: Northwest Mansion Mystery
episodes.plot: Pacifica invites Dipper over to her mansion in order to get rid of a ghost.

episodes.title: Not What He Seems
episodes.plot: The twins wonder if they really know Grunkle Stan after he is taken into custody by the government agents.

episodes.title: A Tale of Two Stans
episodes.plot: The reuniting of the Pine brothers Stanford and Stanley. A series of flashbacks from their lives are shown, and their history together is explained.

episodes.title: Dungeons, Dungeons, and More Dungeons
episodes.plot: Dipper finds an unlikely friend to join him with his newest obsession- a nerdy board game called "Dungeons, Dungeons and More Dungeons."

episodes.title: The Stanchurian Candidate
episodes.plot: When Grunkle Stan decides to run for mayor, Dipper and Mabel have their work cut out for them trying to turn their gaffe-prone uncle into the perfect candidate.

episodes.title: The Last Mabelcorn
episodes.plot: A new threat leads Mabel to venture into the enchanted realm of the unicorns. Meanwhile, Dipper learns an unexpected twist about the enigmatic Bill Cipher.

episodes.title: Roadside Attraction
episodes.plot: Grunkle Stan takes the kids with him on a road-trip to sabotage all the other tourist traps in Oregon.

episodes.title: Dipper and Mabel vs. the Future
episodes.plot: As Dipper and Mabel's 13th birthday approaches, Ford and Dipper go on a dangerous mission.

episodes.title: Weirdmageddon: Part 1
episodes.plot: Bill has returned to take down the Pines family. But this time he has brought some of his friends with him.

episodes.title: Weirdmageddon 2: Escape from Reality
episodes.plot: While Dipper, Soos, and Wendy try to save Mabel from a strange new world, Bill's forces plan their next move.

episodes.title: Weirdmageddon 3: Take Back the Falls
episodes.plot: The Pines family make their greatest sacrifice yet and arrive at their ultimate fate following a final showdown with Bill.
